member.name: T:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Containers.IDependencyContainer
member.summary: Manages the containment of dependencies, providing localized resolution while accounting for dependency scope and accessibility.

member.summary: Deregisters the dependency identified by the given registration.
member.param: The registration that identifies the dependency to be deregistered.
member.returns: This container, to chain additional manipulations.

member.summary: Registers the dependency defined by the given specification.

The registration that can identify the dependency for deregistration by
member.returns: This container, to chain additional manipulations.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Containers.IDependencyContainer.Resolve(System.Type,System.Object@)
member.summary: Resolves the dependency of the specified type with the first registered implementation.
member.param: The type of the contract to be resolved.
The resolving dependency implementation, or null if it could not be resolved.
member.returns: Whether the dependency was successfully resolved.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Containers.IDependencyContainer.ResolveAll(System.Type)
member.summary: Resolves the dependency of the specified type with all registered implementations.
member.param: The type of the contract to be resolved.
member.returns: The collection of all resolving implementations..

member.name: T:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Dependency`1
member.summary: Wraps a contract type to accommodate dynamic runtime fulfillment for its dependents.
member.typeparam: The type of the contract that will be fulfilled as a dependency.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Dependency`1.Get
member.summary: Provides the pre-resolved implementation that fulfills this dependency, if it has been resolved.
member.remarks: This provides a cached instance of the last resolution, regardless of the of the dependency.
member.returns: The pre-resolved implementation, or null if it has not been resolved.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Dependency`1.GetOrResolve(Chopsticks.Dependencies.Containers.IDependencyContainer)
member.summary: Attempts to provide a pre-resolved implementation that fulfills this dependency, otherwise it will attempt to resolve the dependency, per its , and to provide any such resolving implementation.
member.remarks: This may provide a cached instance of the last resolution, regardless of the of the dependency.
member.param: The container from which the dependency will be resolved.
member.returns: Either the pre-resolved implementation or a newly resolved implementation.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Dependency`1.Resolve(Chopsticks.Dependencies.Containers.IDependencyContainer)
member.summary: Attempts to resolve the dependency, per its , and to provide any such resolving implementation.
member.param: The container from which the dependency will be resolved.
member.returns: The newly resolved implementation.

member.name: T:Chopsticks.Dependencies.DependencyLifetime
member.summary: Specifies how a dependency is resolved across dependents.

member.name: F:Chopsticks.Dependencies.DependencyLifetime.Contained
member.summary: A new dependency will be instantiated for each container in which it is resolved.
member.remarks: The dependency, within its container, is maintained the same as a dependency with a lifetime.

member.name: F:Chopsticks.Dependencies.DependencyLifetime.Singleton
member.summary: A single dependency will be instantiated and used for resolution across all of its dependents, within the scope of its container and its child containers (if they permit inheritance from their parent).
member.remarks: Singletons are maintained by the container until they are either deregistered or the container is disposed, at which time the singleton will also be disposed if it is disposable.

member.name: F:Chopsticks.Dependencies.DependencyLifetime.Transient
member.summary: A new dependency will be instantiated for each resolution.
member.remarks: Transient dependencies are traditionally very temporal with no expectations of persistent data or disposability. Any such exceptional expectations should be defined on the dependency's contract and handled by the dependent.

member.name: T:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Exceptions.MissingDependencyException
member.summary: Represents a failure to resolve a required dependency.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Exceptions.MissingDependencyException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Represents a failure to resolve a required dependency.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: T:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.ContainedResolution
member.remarks: This resolution assumes the dependency has a lifetime of .

member.remarks: This resolution assumes the dependency has a lifetime of .

member.name: T:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.DependencyResolution
member.summary: Resolves, and maintains resolved implementation instances of, the dependency specified by the provided dependency specification.
member.param: The contract that this resolution fulfills.
The factory that provides implementations for resolution.

member.summary: Resolves, and maintains resolved implementation instances of, the dependency specified by the provided dependency specification.
member.param: The contract that this resolution fulfills.
The factory that provides implementations for resolution.

member.name: P:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.DependencyResolution.Registration
member.summary: The registration that identifies this resolution as a dependency of a .

member.name: P:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.DependencyResolution.Factory
member.summary: The factory that provides implementations for resolution.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.DependencyResolution.Dispose
member.summary: Performs disposal of all instances managed, either directly or indirectly through a factory, by this resolution.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.DependencyResolution.DisposeFor(Chopsticks.Dependencies.Containers.IDependencyContainer)
member.summary: Performs disposal of any instances that are exclusive to the specified container and that are directly managed by this resolution.
member.param: The container whose exclusive instances are directly managed by this resolution will be disposed.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.DependencyResolution.Get(Chopsticks.Dependencies.Containers.IDependencyContainer)
member.summary: Provides an implementation to resolve the dependency.
member.param: The container that will provide any constructed implementation's own dependencies.
member.returns: An implementation that resolves the dependency, or null if this resolution has been disposed of.

member.name: T:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.IDependencyResolutionFactory
member.summary: Manages the construction of dependency resolutions.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.IDependencyResolutionFactory.BuildResolutionFor(Chopsticks.Dependencies.Containers.DependencySpecification)
member.summary: Builds a resolution appropriate for the given specification.
member.param: The specification that will define the resolution.
member.returns: The new resolution.

member.name: T:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.IDependencyResolutionProvider
member.summary: Provides resolutions for dependencies.

member.name: P:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.IDependencyResolutionProvider.InheritParentDependencies
member.summary: Specifies whether this provider should inherit all of its parent provider's registered dependencies.

member.name: P:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.IDependencyResolutionProvider.Parent
member.summary: The parent of this provider.
member.remarks: This is null if this provider has no parent.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.IDependencyResolutionProvider.CanProvide(System.Type)
member.summary: Specifies whether a resolution for the specified contract can be provided.
member.param: The contract to be checked for.
member.returns: Whether a resolution can be provided for the specified contract.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.IDependencyResolutionProvider.GetResolution(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides the first resolution that will resolve the specified contract.
member.param: The type of the contract.
member.returns: The first resolving resolution, or null if there is no such resolution.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.IDependencyResolutionProvider.GetResolutions(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides all resolutions that will resolve the specified contract.
member.param: The type of the contract.
member.returns: All resolving resolutions. If there are none, the returned collection will be empty.

member.name: M:Chopsticks.Dependencies.Resolutions.IDependencyResolutionProvider.GetResolutionsForDisposal
member.summary: Provides all disposable resolutions known to this provider.
member.remarks: This includes all resolutions of a parent provider.
member.returns: All disposable resolutions. If there are none, the returned collection will be empty.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExternalInit
member.summary: Reserved to be used by the compiler for tracking metadata. This class should not be used by developers in source code. This dummy class is required to compile records when targeting .NET Standard
